column5: On Wed. 4 of us drove to Parry sound and flew out to a lake for the day. They have boats and motors there. We spent the day catching bass and pike. Good times indeed. With tax in it cost $250 per man. The flight was worth it!!!!! We are going back next year for sure.CX
Good to hear you enjoyed your day Chris!!  ..oh and you did take your camera with you??

Sounds like Rainbow Airways....I almost did that once.  We ended up driving to one of the lakes they fly into instead...the guy answering the phones had no problem spilling the beans    Mind you, getting into the place was a lot tougher than flying
www.georgianbayairways.com is the guys we used. Very pro. CX
